capabilities.name: check_http_status
capabilities.desc: Fetch a list of known paths and record HTTP status and basic evidence.

capabilities.name: validate_json
capabilities.desc: Attempt to parse JSON and mark WARN if invalid JSON.

capabilities.name: visa_id
capabilities.desc: Compute a SHA-256 based VisaID from a deterministic summary.

capabilities.name: render_report
capabilities.desc: Render results in a human-readable table (EN+中文).
